bibl.title: Notes on Papyri.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Continued from: BASP 51 (2014) pp. 191-198. - P.Wisc. 1.31 (Andrew Connor). - Bemerkungen zu Urkunden: P.Mich. inv. 414 [ed.: Jennifer Sheridan Moss, Much Ado About the Grape Harvest. A Letter from Apollonios to His Father, BASP 45 (2008) pp. 241-246, 1 pl.]; - P.Col. inv. 46 [ed.: Katherine Blouin, An Arsinoite Loan of Money with Interest in Kind, BASP 47 (2010) pp. 93-109, 2 tabl., 1 pl.]; - P.Tebt. II 523; - P.Tebt. II 583 (Dieter Hagedorn). - P.Lund 4.13.1-2 [= S.B. VI, 9349] (James G. Keenan). - Πατέλλα in the Greek Papyri (Nikos Litinas). - On the Etymology of ""Limpet"" (Nikos Litinas). - Avec résumé en anglais.
